title: Seikou!: Osananajimi wa Terekusasou ni Uso wo Tsuku

synonyms: Seikou!: Lose A Virgin For The First Term
alternative_titles.ja: せいこう！ ～幼なじみは照れくさそうに嘘をつく～

synopsis:
Anime adaptation of the original project by a PC adult game developer, SPEED.

The storyline revolves around a princess that has returned after 3 years, and a hero that is given the burden to protect the girls (both the princess and the younger sister).
